comment: Great idea HOWEVER - There should be an option to get 'continuous' warnings. There should be an interval setting where we can select say - 1 or 5 or 15 or 30 min warnings. If the user does not wish this to occur they can set the interval to 0  Rob PS Apologies if you have already provided this feature (and I have not found it yet)

Concept is great, but execution is not. When turning on wifi, it automatically generates a message before even checking to see if wifi is available. This can become a hassle. Very obnoxious where wifi is patchy. Remedy these issues, and it would be a 5 star app.
This one really ones you when your wife I've comes on

title: Terrific
comment: This app is great. Works solid on 4.1.2 where other wifi managers don't .  Many apps fail by trying to do too much.  Keep it simple.  Thanks!

title: Handy...
comment: But could be great if it could be set to turn off the Wi-Fi if it is switched on but not connected for 3 mins. Is that possible? Thanks.
Might be possible. I don't have much free time right now, and this would require quite a lot of new code. Don't hold your breath, yet. ;)
